clear.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
steps: Grill the chicken breast until fully cooked.
Combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and feta cheese in a bowl.
Slice the grilled chicken and place it on top of the salad.
Drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette and toss gently.
Serve and enjoy!

clear.name: Fruit Smoothie
steps: Combine banana, berries, Greek yogurt, honey, and ice cubes in a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a glass and enjoy your refreshing fruit smoothie!

clear.name: Caprese Sandwich
steps: Slice the ciabatta bread and lightly toast it.
Layer tomato slices, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves on the bread.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil.
Top with another slice of bread to make a sandwich.
Cut in half and enjoy your delicious Caprese sandwich!

haze.name: Oatmeal with Berries and Nuts
steps: Cook rolled oats in a pot with milk and water until softened.
Top with berries, nuts, honey, and cinnamon.
Enjoy a warm and comforting bowl of oatmeal!

haze.name: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
steps: Toast sourdough bread until lightly golden.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread avocado mixture on toast.
Poach eggs in water with white vinegar.
Place poached eggs on top of avocado toast and season with salt and pepper.

haze.name: Smoothie Bowl with Acai Berries
steps: Blend acai berries, frozen banana, and almond milk until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with granola, berries, and cocoa nibs.
Enjoy a refreshing and energizing smoothie bowl!

clouds.name: Creamy Tomato Soup
steps: Saut√© onions and garlic in a pot until softened.
Add tomatoes and cook until they break down.
Pour in vegetable broth and simmer.
Blend the soup until smooth, then stir in heavy cream.
Season with basil, salt, and pepper.
Serve with croutons on top.

clouds.name: Pasta Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a separate pan, cook bacon until crispy.
Whisk eggs and mix in grated Parmesan cheese.
Drain cooked pasta and mix with the egg and cheese mixture.
Add crispy bacon and season with black pepper.
Serve immediately.

clouds.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
steps: Cut bell peppers in half and remove seeds.
Cook ground beef with onion and garlic.
Mix in cooked rice and tomato sauce.
Stuff bell peppers with the mixture.
Top with cheese and bake until peppers are tender.

rain.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
steps: Bring chicken broth to a simmer.
Add chicken breast and cook until done.
Add chopped carrots, celery, onion, and garlic.
Cook egg noodles separately and add to the soup.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

rain.name: Crispy Fried Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken pieces in buttermilk.
Mix flour, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Coat each chicken piece in the flour mixture.
Deep fry until golden brown and crispy.
Serve hot and enjoy!

rain.name: Vegetable Pakoras
steps: Mix chickpea flour with spices and baking soda.
Add water to form a thick batter.
Dip sliced vegetables into the batter.
Deep fry until golden brown and crispy.
Serve with chutney.

default.name: Anytime Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a separate pan, cook ground beef with onion and garlic.
Add tomato sauce and Italian herbs.
Combine pasta with the meat sauce.
Top with Parmesan cheese and serve.

default.name: Margarita Pizza
steps: Roll out pizza dough into a thin crust.
Top with sliced tomatoes and fresh mozzarella.
Bake until crust is golden and cheese is melted.
Sprinkle with fresh basil, drizzle with olive oil, and add a pinch of salt.
Slice and enjoy your Margarita Pizza!

default.name: Fruit Salad
steps: Wash and chop the mixed fruits.
Drizzle with honey and squeeze lime juice over the fruits.
Toss gently to combine.
Garnish with fresh mint leaves.
Serve and refresh yourself with a delightful fruit salad!
